@graph.caption: Slices of oat wheat bread on a wooden cutting board

@graph.name: Oat Wheat Bread with candied Papaya, Mango and Pineapple! - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Oat wheat bread made with candied papaya, mango and pineapple. A delicious sweet and savory bread that's so easy to make. Vegan and nut free.

itemListElement.name: Oat Wheat Bread with candied Papaya, Mango and Pineapple!

@graph.name: Oat wheat Bread with Candied Papaya, Mango and Pineapple
@graph.description: An easy to make homemade bread with tropical fruit
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup honey (add 1 cup if you want a sweet bread)
1/2 cup old fashioned oats cooked in 1/2 cup milk

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the water and add sugar and yeast to it. Mix well and keep aside for 10 minutes till it starts getting some bubbles.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm the water and add sugar and yeast to it. Mix well and keep aside for 10 minutes till it starts getting some bubbles.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, mix the all purpose flour, salt and nutmeg.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, mix the all purpose flour, salt and nutmeg.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the yeast mixture and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the yeast mixture and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the oats in milk and let sit till they cool down to a warm state.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the oats in milk and let sit till they cool down to a warm state.

recipeInstructions.text: Add oats to the flour mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add oats to the flour mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add whole wheat flour one cup at a time to make into a soft smooth dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Add whole wheat flour one cup at a time to make into a soft smooth dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in a well oiled container. Cover it and place in warm oven for an hour or till it doubles.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in a well oiled container. Cover it and place in warm oven for an hour or till it doubles.

recipeInstructions.text: Knead dough on a floured surface and flatten into a thick rectangle.
recipeInstructions.name: Knead dough on a floured surface and flatten into a thick rectangle.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle candied papaya, pineapple and mango on it. Roll it up and knead again.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle candied papaya, pineapple and mango on it. Roll it up and knead again.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in a bread pan lightly covered with a wet towel in a warm oven for half an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in a bread pan lightly covered with a wet towel in a warm oven for half an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove towel and bake at 350 degrees F for 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove towel and bake at 350 degrees F for 25 minutes.

@graph.keywords: easy bread recipe, fruit bread, homemade bread
